Package com.redis.foundation.std

Class Sleep

java.lang.Object
com.redis.foundation.std.Sleep
public class Sleep extends Object
The Sleep class provides utility methods for pausing program execution.

The Apache Commons has a number of good utility methods for this. http://commons.apache.org/proper/commons-lang/javadocs/api-release/index.html

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0 Jan 2, 2014
Author:
Al Cole
